affect ( "first_spawnguy1", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );

	task ( "walking_one" )
	{
		set ( "SET_GOAL", "Guard" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "bridge_1" );
		set ( "SET_NAVGOAL2", "bridge_2" );
	}

	dowait ( "walking_one" );
}
